mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysMall Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MALL_ID , SSO_GRP_CD , USE_YN , CAL_USE_YN , MALL_NM , MALL_URL , CPR_NM , RPRSTIV_NM , CPR_REG_NO , BMAN_REG_NO , MOS_REGNO , RPRST_EMAIL , PSNL_INFO_MANAGE_MGR_NM , SORT_SEQ , NTCN_TAK_USE_YN , POST_NO , BASE_ADDR , DETAIL_ADDR , TEL_NATION_NO , TEL_AREA_NO , TEL_TLOF_NO , TEL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , FAX_NATION_NO , FAX_AREA_NO , FAX_TLOF_NO , FAX_TLOF_WTHN_NO , CC_EMAIL , CC_TEL_NATION_NO , CC_TEL_AREA_NO , CC_TEL_TLOF_NO , CC_TEL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , CC_FAX_NATION_NO , CC_FAX_AREA_NO , CC_FAX_TLOF_NO , CC_FAX_TLOF_WTHN_NO , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_MALL WHERE 1 = 1 AND MALL_ID = #{mallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteSysMall Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM SYS_MALL WHERE 1 = 1 AND MALL_ID = #{mallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
